name: LEADLight
description:
So this is an early prototype of an idea we had based around an art style. move with WASD and use right click. That's all you need to know to solve this one puzzle.

Conceptually a full version of this game would lean towards the type of puzzles you need to stare at for a long a while to figure out (but not in a Fez kinda way where you need to make alien alphabet cubes, something more dynamic but cryptic like Starseed Pilgrim.) It would also probably lean heavily on a linear narrative along with environmental story telling.

Please leave any comments about your experience: whether you were able to solve it, what was confusing, if you'd like to see the concept explored further.
